mapper.select: select * from movie_schedule ORDER BY schedule_startTime DESC
SELECT a.* from (SELECT a.*, rownum rn from ( SELECT * from movie_schedule order by schedule_startTime desc) a where rownum <= #{end} ) a where rn >= #{start}
SELECT count(*) FROM movie_schedule where schedule_no = #{scheduleNo}
SELECT count(*) FROM movie_schedule where schedule_no like '%'||#{scheduleNo}||'%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO movie_schedule ( schedule_no, schedule_startTime, screen_totalseat, screen_restSeat, movie_no, screen_no, schedule_finishTime ) VALUES ( movie_schedule_seq.nextval, #{scheduleStartTime}, #{screenTotalSeat}, #{screenTotalSeat}, #{movieNo}, #{screenNo}, #{scheduleFinishTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE movie_schedule SET schedule_startTime = #{scheduleStartTime}, schedule_finishTime =#{scheduleFinishTime}, screen_no = #{screenNo}, movie_no = #{movieNo}, screen_totalseat = #{screenTotalSeat} WHERE schedule_no = #{scheduleNo}
